summary: An ordinance refunding excess portions of certain assessments levied for the improvement of the alley in block 21, C. D. Boren's Addition, under Ordinance No. 17210, creating Local Improvement District No. 1623, to payors thereof, directing the City Treasurer to prepare a detailed list of said payors of assessment, authorizing the drawing of warrants and appropriating money out of said Local Improvement Fund for said purpose.
